scores.translation_reasoning: All PRD requirements have launch coverage. GTM elements complete including training materials and support documentation. Minor deduction for stakeholder communication plan needing more detail on executive updates.
scores.value_reasoning: Phased rollout (10% -> 50% -> 100%) optimally balances risk and speed. Beta targeting power users who experience Search Accuracy pain most acutely. Feedback loops close within 48 hours for rapid iteration.

translation_breakdown.reasoning: Performance target captured with monitoring approach

Stakeholder coverage but executive reporting cadence needs detail
